plot: When a worried-sick mom takes her son to the hospital, she quickly realizes a different kind of emergency has been brewing. Fears meet a fast-acting dose of TLC in this family drama.
title: Sang froid
plot_es: When a worried-sick mom takes her son to the hospital, she quickly realizes a different kind of emergency has been brewing. Fears meet a fast-acting dose of TLC in this family drama.
plot_en: When a worried-sick mom takes her son to the hospital, she quickly realizes a different kind of emergency has been brewing. Fears meet a fast-acting dose of TLC in this family drama.
